message.content:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: public static String convertName(String name) {
    StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(name, ",");
    String lastName = st.nextToken().trim();
    String firstName = st.nextToken().trim();
    return firstName + " " + lastName;
}
<<<explanation>>>: In the given code, we are using the StringTokenizer to split the input name string using the comma (",") as the delimiter. We then retrieve the last name using the first call to nextToken() and trim any leading or trailing spaces. Similarly, we retrieve the first name using the second call to nextToken() and trim any leading or trailing spaces. Finally, we concatenate the first name and last name with a space in between and return the result.
